title: Partner Account Creation (request)
description: This call initiates the state machine for account creation process

address_line_1.description: Within 70 characters, with no leading whitespaces and may contain letters/numbers and/or any of following characters '.,:;()@#/-

address_postcode.description: [Optional] Within 20 characters and may not contain '+'.

citizen.description: [Optional] Country of legal citizenship, 2-letter country code.

company_name.description: [Optional] Company name. Only applicable for partners of type company.

company_registration_no.description: [Optional] Company registration number. Only applicable for partners of type company.

currency.description: [Optional] To set currency of the account. List of supported currencies can be acquired with `payout_currencies` call.

first_name.description: Within 1-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

landing_company_short.description: [Optional] If specified, will return only the underlyings for the specified landing company.

last_name.description: Within 1-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

non_pep_declaration.description: [Optional] Indicates client's self-declaration of not being a PEP/RCA (Politically Exposed Person/Relatives and Close Associates).

partner_type.description: Defines whether this partner is an individual or a company. Only applicable for partners

phone.description: [Optional] Starting with `+` followed by 8-35 digits, allowing hyphens or space.

residence.description: 2-letter country code, possible value receive from `residence_list` call.

salutation.description: Accept any value in enum list.

tnc_acceptance.description: The tnc acceptance status of the user.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
